name: Ayaw Pong Buot
description:
Introduction

This is a radial pong-inspired game. In which, instead of being a radial, it is in the square form. The main objective of this game is to deflect the ball in getting the outside core. However, you will still have your life decreasing. So be careful

Controls

Arrow Keys - Paddle Activation

1 - Fast Upgrade

2 - Activate Upgrade

3 - Health Restoration
